h:head.h:title: 2. Formulário Individual da Criança - Conhecimentos, Atitudes e Práticas dos Alunos na Escola Hookworm V6.1

text.value: The length cannot exceed 5 character and must not contain number
The code must be between 9 and 100
Please record the following unique ID code for the respondent on a separate list and on each diagnostic test(s) administered
The year must be between 6 and 9 (2012 and 2015)
The year must be between 2012 and 2015
3. What school grade are you in?
4. How many people live at home?
5. What is the main source of water for your home?
Read out options, choose ONE option. May show the picture sheets as guide to different water sources.

6. What is your main place of defecation at home?
May use picture sheets to as guide to different toilet types. Choose all items mentioned.
(2) Pit latrine (a) without slab (i) Do not flush (direct pit)
(2) Pit latrine (b) without slab (ii) Flush with water (near house)
(2) Pit latrine (b) without slab (iii) Flush with water (away from house)
If "No structure", "Don't know" or "No answer" is selected, no other response is allowed.
7. Where do you defecate at school?
May use picture sheets to as guide to different toilet types. Choose all items mentioned.
(2) Pit latrine (a) without slab (i) Do not flush (direct pit)
(2) Pit latrine (b) without slab (ii) Flush with water (near house)
(2) Pit latrine (b) without slab (iii) Flush with water (away from house)
8. Do you wash your hands after defecating at home?
Read out options, choose ONE option.
9. Do you wash your hands after defecating at school?
Read out options, choose ONE option.
10. Do you wash your hands before meals at home?
Read out options, choose ONE option.
11. Do you wash your hands before meals at school?
Read out options, choose ONE option.
12. What do you use to wash your hands at home?
Read out options, choose ONE option.
13. What do you use to wash your hands at school?
Read out options, choose ONE option.
14. Have you recently made changes to how you use water?
15. Have you recently made changes to how you wash your hands?
16. Do you always wear shoes when outdoors?
Read out options, choose ONE option.
17. Do you always wear shoes when going to defecate?
Read out options, choose ONE option.
18. Do you always wear shoes when urinating?
Read out options, choose ONE option.
Knowledge about intestinal helminthiasis (lombrigas), symptoms, transmission and control
19. Have you ever heard about intestinal worms (lombrigas) before?
20. Have you had intestinal worms (lombrigas) before?
21. Where / how did you get to know about intestinal worms (lombrigas)?
Read out all options, choose all options mentioned
22. How can you treat intestinal worms (lombrigas)?
Question only for children age 9 years and above. Read out all options, choose all options mentioned.
23. In the past 12 months, have you seen any dog with another animal with a "Guinea worm" (Guinea worm)?
If so, where did you see it?
24. In the past 12 months, have you seen any human being with a "Guinea worm" (Guinea worm)?
If so, where did you see it?
Knowledge about schistosomiasis, symptoms, transmission and control
25. Have you ever heard about schistosomiasis (bilharzíase) before?
26. Have you ever had schistosomiasis (bilharzíase) before?
27. Where / how did you get to know about schistosomiasis (bilharzíase)?
Question only for children age 9 years and above. Read out all options, choose all options mentioned.
Awareness and acceptability of large-scale distribution of medicine to control intestinal worms (lombrigas) or schistosomiasis (bilharzíase)
If "Don't know" or "No answer" is selected, no other response is allowed.
29. There was a visit to the school last year where medicine was given to all children. Do you know what the medicine was for?
Read out all options, choose all options mentioned.
30. Did you take the medicine that was delivered through the school last year?
If "Don't know" or "No answer" is selected, no other response is allowed.
31. Why did you take the medicine?
Read out all options, choose all options mentioned
2.I thought that I might have intestinal worms at the time of distribution (lombrigas)
5.I thought that I might have schistosomiasis (bilharzíase) at the time of distribution
11.Forced to take by parent / guardian / caregiver
32. Did you find it easy to take the medicine?
If "Yes, but not sure which medicine", "No", "Don't know" or "No answer" is selected, no other response is allowed.
33. Did you have any side effects after taking the medicine?
Read out all options, choose all options mentioned.
1.Yes, to the medicine for intestinal worms (lombrigas)
If "Cannot remember" is selected, no other response is allowed.
34. Could you please specify some of the side effects?
Read out all options, choose all options mentioned.
If "Other" or "Cannot remember" is selected, no other response is allowed.
35. How were these side effects managed?
Read out all options, choose all options mentioned.
36. Why did you not take the medicine?
Question only for children who did not take the medicine (i.e., answered "No" to question 26).
If chosen answer 3, please specify concerns
37. Are you happy with the medicine to kill intestinal worms (lombrigas) being delivered to you at school?
38. Were you happy with the teachers giving you the medicine to kill intestinal worms (lombrigas)?
39. If medicine to kill intestinal worms (lombrigas) is offered in the future to all school children would you be willing to take it?
If "Other", "Don't know" or "No answer" is selected, no other response is allowed.
40. Why would you take the medicine to kill intestinal worms (lombrigas) if there is future delivery of medicines in your school to all school children?
Read out all options, choose all options mentioned.
4.Forced to take it by household head / parent / guardian / medication distributor or any other person
41. Why would you not take medicine to kill intestinal worms (lombrigas) if there was future delivery of medicines in your school to all school children?
Read out all options, choose all options mentioned.
If choosen answer 2, please specify concerns
If "Don't know" or "No answer" is selected, no other response is allowed.
42. If given a choice, how or where would you prefer the medicine to kill intestinal worms (lombrigas) be given?
Read out all options, choose all options mentioned.
43. Are you happy with the medicine to kill schistosomiasis (bilharzíase) being delivered to you at school?
44. Were you happy with the teachers giving you the medicine to kill schistosomiasis (bilharzíase)?
45. If medicine to kill schistosomiasis (bilharzíase) is offered in the future to all school children would you be willing to take it?
If "Don't know" or "No answer" is selected, no other response is allowed.
46. Why would you take the medicine to kill schistosomiasis (bilharzíase) if there is future delivery of medicines in your school to all school children?
Read out all options, choose all options mentioned.
4.Forced to take it by household head / parent / guardian / medication distributor or any other person
If "Don't know" or "No answer" is selected, no other response is allowed.
47. Why would you not take medicine to kill schistosomiasis (bilharzíase) if there is future delivery of medicines in your school to all school children?
Read out all options, choose all options mentioned.
If choosen answer 2, please specify concerns
If "Don't know" or "No answer" is selected, no other response is allowed.
48. If given a choice, how or where would you prefer the medicine to kill schistosomiasis (bilharzíase) be given?
Read out all options, choose all options mentioned.
This completes the questionnaire. We are grateful for your participation, thank you.
